headline: Is Blackstone Stock Pricing In Too Much Optimism After Recent Share Price Rebound?
summary: Wondering if Blackstone at around $151 a share is a bargain, a trap, or just fairly priced is exactly what we are going to unpack together. The stock is down 0.6% over the last week but up 6.9% over the past month, while still sitting 13.0% lower year to date and 17.3% below where it was a year ago, despite impressive 3 year and 5 year gains of 119.6% and 178.1% respectively. Those swings reflect shifting expectations around private markets, fundraising momentum, and broader interest rate...
